thumb.title: Eternal / 初音ミク
thumb.description: Eternal知られざる罪悪感、胸を締め付ける痛み壊れた時計が時を刻む、止まった針は戻らない迷える魂が彷徨うかすかに聞こえる、優しく私を呼ぶ誰かの声でもそれは届かない遠い声どうか安らかに眠らせてください許しは求めません、ただ静寂の安らぎを永遠の眠り、深い闇の中へA distorted mirror reflects me, white hands stained with bloodUnknown guilt, pain that tightens my chestA broken clock ticks time, the stopped hands will not returnJust walking like an empty shell, a lost soul wandersI can faintly hear someone's voice, calling out to me gentlyBut it's a distant voice that doesn't reach me, a fading hopeAngel of slaughter, rest your wings, please let me sleep peacefullyThese blood-stained hands will no longer hurt peopleI don't ask for forgiveness, I just wish for the peace of silenceAngel of slaughter, eternal sleep, into the deep darknessMusic,Lyric,All Sound Prog : SonataIllust : Untold story
